name: Raspberry White Chocolate Mousse
author: Stacey Walery
summary: This is a light and fluffy mousse with a wonderful raspberry sauce. Great layered like a parfait then frozen. Additional Raspberry sauce can be spooned over cakes or served with mousse.
directions: Process berries in a blender or food processor until smooth
Strain mixture into a small bowl, and discard seeds
Add the sugar and liqueur, and stir until sugar dissolves
In a heavy saucepan on low heat, warm 1/4 cup of the cream and the white chocolate, stirring constantly until chocolate melts
Let mixture cool until it is lukewarm
Stir in 1 tablespoon of raspberry sauce, and the food coloring
In a medium bowl, whip remaining 1 1/2 cup cream to soft peaks
Fold into melted chocolate mixture, one-third at a time, until no streaks remain
Layer into parfait dishes, and serve with the sauce
May also be used to fill or ice a cake
